Date: Monday, 6/23/1990
Subject: Progress of F.P. Santangelo
Dear Sir,
F.P. Santangelo has an AVG of .275 at A Fort Lauderdale Yankees!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 6/29/1990
Subject: Progress of Rudy Pemberton
Dear Sir,
Rudy Pemberton is hitting the ball well at AA Albany-Colonie Yankees!
He has an AVG of .275, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 9/9/1990
Subject: Sean Berry learns new position
Sean Berry has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Second Base.
I would rate his skills as "D" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Saturday, 9/20/1990
Subject: Mike Morgan healing process
Mike Morgan is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
